section.heading: Legal shipments of gaming devices into New York state

content.p:
ยง 189-c. Legal shipments of gaming devices into New York state. All
shipments into this state of gaming devices, excluding slot machines and
coin operated gambling devices, as defined in subdivision seven-a of
section 225.00 of the penal law, the registering, recording and labeling
of which has been duly had by the manufacturer or dealer thereof in
accordance with sections three and four of an Act of Congress of the
United States entitled "An act to prohibit transportation of gambling
devices in interstate and foreign commerce," approved January second,
nineteen hundred fifty-one, being chapter 1194, 64 Stat. 1134, and also
designated as 15 U.S.C. (1171-1177), shall be deemed legal shipments
thereof into this state.
